bEtre is a social media platform built for authentic self-expression. Inspired by the French word \"Ãªtre\,\" meaning \"to be\,\" bEtre empowers users to share who they truly are.
Our app allows users to create posts\, add location-based tags\, and engage in meaningful conversations. Whether you\'re connecting with friends or exploring new content\, bEtre helps you discover and express yourself in a genuine way.
We believe in building a safe and respectful community. With tools for moderation and user management\, bEtre ensures a positive environment for everyone.
At its heart\, bEtre is about being real\, being connected\, and being yourself.

Your privacy is important to us. We ensure that your data is protected and managed securely. Here are some key points about our privacy policy\: 


• We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent.
 • Your data is stored securely and is protected by encryption.
 • You can control see privacy settings and manage what information is shared.
 • We comply with all data protection regulations to ensure your information is safe.

You have full control over your account settings and privacy preferences. Here are your rights and options for managing your account\:


• You can update your profile information\, including name\, phone\, and profile picture at any time.
 • Control your privacy by adjusting who can view your posts and profile.
 • You have the right to delete your account permanently, and all associated data will be removed.
 • Manage notifications to control what updates you receive from the app.
 • Review and update your security settings\, such as changing your password and enabling two\-factor authentication.
